official_title: To recognize the 75th Anniversary of the International Ladies Garment Workers' Union (ILGWU) Health Center.

summary.text: Recognizes the historic significance of the International Ladies' Garment Workers' Union (ILGWU) Health Center, the first union health center, on its 75th anniversary. Commends the ILGWU for establishing and maintaining the Center.

titles.title: To recognize the 75th Anniversary of the International Ladies Garment Workers' Union (ILGWU) Health Center.
